channel.title: Football question
channel.description:
ok i just got back from a football game and i was wondering...
lets say you are kicking off and the receiver on the other team tips the ball and it hits the ground so it goes live (meaning any team can pick it up). The player picks the ball back up, runs to the backwards touchdown there defending and takes a knee. Is that a safety and your team gets 2 points and the ball or is it a touch back where that team gets the ball on the 20?

item.title: Football question
item.dc:creator: @bigmc91 bigmc91
item.description:
@bigmc91 wrote:

i say its a safety cause thats the same as running backwards into the enzone. but he didnt get tackled? ok ok ok reguardless why the hell would he run backwards? only thing i can think of is that he muct be a puss.

Read full topic

item.title: Football question
item.dc:creator: @phonnygoblin phonnygoblin
item.description:
@phonnygoblin wrote:

bobthecat:

technically yes but like during the kickoff the ball has to go at least 10 yards until the kickoff team can pick it up or the other team will get it at the spot they touched it… that’s what i meant

Look! I can bold parts of text to make you look stupid too! l2specify

Read full topic

item.title: Football question
item.dc:creator: @phonnygoblin phonnygoblin
item.description:
@phonnygoblin wrote:

No…? If, after the ball goes ten yards, the kicking team picks it up, the ball is theirs.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @bobthecat bobthecat
item.description:
@bobthecat wrote:

technically yes but like during the kickoff the ball has to go at least 10 yards until the kickoff team can pick it up or the other team will get it at the spot they touched it… that’s what i meant

item.title: Football question
item.dc:creator: @phonnygoblin phonnygoblin
item.description:
@phonnygoblin wrote:

It’s a safety, and during a kick off the ball is always live, it’s only during a punt where the receiving team has to touch the ball first. the reason the refs probably overturned it was because they didn’t believe the entire ball broke the goal line.

Read full topic

item.title: Football question
item.dc:creator: @bobthecat bobthecat
item.description:
@bobthecat wrote:

ok because at first the refs called it a safety, but then got influenced by the coaches in the other team and then revised their called to a touch back.

Read full topic

item.title: Football question
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

I would say it’s a safety.
